pages.text: Falling and getting back up is an essential part of life, sometimes however you'd like it to hurt less. Therefore botanists have devised a device that will dissipate the energy that is released when falling using $(aura). That device is the $(item)Dampening Feather$() and all you need to create it are some $(item)Feathers of the Skies$(), $(item)Ingots of the Skies$() and a bit of $(thing)Sunlight$().
Asking for $(item)Feathers of the Skies$(), feathers imbued with the strength of angels.
